post.body: We're looking into this issue
What's the issue you're having?
If you make them an admin at IntenseDebate, they'll get comment notifications.
We appreciate the install!
sorry, for now we just track your IntenseDebate comments.
Hey! We sent you an email a few hours ago with answers to most of your questions.
yep! you can assign multiple admins to a single blog in your blog settings page at http://intensedebate.com
your import will take some time. how's your import? if you're still experiencing issues pls email support@intensedebate.com
coming soon. please dm me for info.
Glad to hear it! Let us know any and all feedback you might have. Thanks again.
Responded
We'll look into this for you. Just so it doesn't get lost in the mix, can you email this to support@intensedebate.com ? Thanks!
I think I've fixed the missing comments issue on that post. Can you confirm (I can't tell since you deactivated)? Thanks!
can you send some examples if you have them?
Thanks. You'll hear from us shortly.
could you email us at support@intensedebate.com? we'll take a look and see what's up.
For example: http://tinyurl.com/9khsxm
I see you've uninstalled IntenseDebate so I can't have a look at that for you. Does this happen on other ID blogs as well?
If you need any assistance, let us know!
What exactly is going wrong? Thanks!
I realize you already fixed this, but what was the issue you were having? Thanks!
We appreciate it!
Please email support@intensedebate.com and we'll have a look.
Can you email support@intensedebate.com with the details (mainly urls). Thanks!
New Post: IntenseDebate & Brightcove: Bringing Comment-Mojo to Video http://blog.intensedebate.com/
New post: WordPress beta plugin version 2.0.16 is now available! Includes new features, enhancements & fixes. http://blog.intensedebate.com
TechCrunch: IntenseDebate Goes Public Again, Releases WordPress Plugin http://tinyurl.com/5buhvl. Thanks @TechCrunch!
IntenseDebate is back! Inject some hi-octane conversational mojo into the standard comment system on your site http://blog.intensedebate.com
IntenseDebate is back up & running after a brief outage this morning. Thanks for your patience. http://blog.intensedebate.com/
Check out the story on TC - http://tinyurl.com/3he6dk . IntenseDebate is now an Automattic Joint!
Automattic acquires IntenseDebate! http://intensedebate.com/blog
Hoping we'll see many of you at BlogWorld Expo 2008!
IntenseDebate is going to Vegas for BlogWorld Expo! http://intensedebate.com/blog
New blog post: IntenseDebate Pledges 1% of Equity to Entrepreneurs Foundation of Colorado - http://intensedebate.com/blog
